about.content: We are a company based in the Upper Orava region, specializing in the production of a wide range of wooden products, mainly from spruce and fir wood. We primarily focus on the production of squared timber from high-quality Pelekita/Uso Trieste wood, pallet boards, wood chips, firewood, and logs. In addition to production, we also offer transportation services.

service.sub_heading: Products made from high-quality spruce and fir wood.

service_4.title: Wood Chips
service_4.text:
• Wood chips
• Bark
• 3 types of fractions

service_5.title: Firewood
service_5.text:
• Logs
• Meter wood
• Split wood
• Sizes: 25-100 cm

service_7.title: Transport
service_7.text: We offer transport of logs and delivery of firewood.
